entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
